data.value: No checkout address has been entered.

data.value: No private or shared repositories with this address exist

data.name: Options_CheckSanity_A_repository_with_this_name_exists
data.value: A Repository with that address already exists

data.name: Options_CheckSanity_Could_not_retrieve_repo_info
data.value: Could not retrieve repository info for this repository. Are you sure the name is spelt correctly?

data.name: Options_CheckSanity_The_checkout_address_is_not_properly_formatted
data.value: The checkout address is not properly formatted. Do you wish to create a new repository with the name {0} instead?

data.name: Options_CheckSanity_The_checkout_address_is_not_empty
data.value: The checkout directory {0} must be empty.

data.name: Options_CheckSanity_The_checkout_directory_already_exists
data.value: The checkout directory already exists. Do you wish to delete it?

data.name: Options_CheckSanity_The_mountpoint_directory_already_exists
data.value: The mountpoint directory already exists. Do you wish to delete it?

data.name: Options_CheckSanity_The_mountpoint_and_checkout_directory_can_not_be_subdirectories
data.value: The mountpoint and checkout directory can not be subdirectories of each other.

data.value: The entered Username/Password combination is invalid

data.value: This will delete the repository {0} and all associated data. Do you wish to continue?
